CatDescriptText: The signs read: "Announcing the Grand Opening of the Pittsburgh Afro-American Language School, 1113 Bedford Avenue, Tonite," "Learn to Talk with Your Neighbor in His Own Language and Thereby Establish Better Racial Relationship," "Learn a Language to Better Enable You to Understand the Other Man's Point of View," "The Language School Specializes in: Classical Hebrew, Yiddish, French, Italian, Russian, German, and others," and "We the Citizens of Pittsburgh Endorse the Establishment of the Afro-American Language School and Recreation Center."
TitMainTitle: Two and a half story frame house, street no. 5916, with PEACE sign in window, next to Hahn Beauty Salon
